ModMetaData.name: Dreamer's Dreams
ModMetaData.author: Qarsoon Meel
ModMetaData.description:
Thank you for downloading my mod! You are amazing!
To report any issue refer to mod page which I check every minute : )
<size=22>Notes:</size> - Doesn't require a new save - On fresh install, currently resting pawns will not get dreams. Dreams will only be applied on rests which started when mod was installed.
<size=22>Features:</size> - Pawns will dream while they rest.
<size=22>Propose a dream!</size> Tell us about your favourite dreams (from your life :> ) and I will try to implement it into the mod :D
<size=22>Happy Dreaming...</size>
